description: Rugged pants built with superior sun protection and advanced repellency. With broad spectrum sun-shielding to block more rays and light rain-and-stain repellency, these pants are ready for anything. Durable ripstop material with a bit of stretch keeps you moving. An integrated belt gives you a just-right fit from sunrise to sunset.
name: Columbia Sportswear Landroamer Ripstop Pants, 30" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Universal, easy fit for comfortable range of motion
